title: Xbox's Phil Spencer Loves The Steam Deck! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.16.21
description:
Blessing and Tim talk about Control hitting 10 Million players, Phil Spencer's love of the Steam Deck, and rock their Sonic bling!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:17 - Housekeeping

A new Kinda Funny Xcast is up right now with Mike, Gary, Barrett talking about Xbox at Gamescom, Hades, and Halo. You can catch that on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and on Podcast services around the globe.

TODAY, Kinda Funny’s hosting the Marvel’s Avengers War for Wakanda Launch Party! Starting at 10 am PT over on twitch.tv/crystaldynamics, Greg and Ms. Marvel herself Sandra Saad (Sod) will be hosting two hours of gameplay, dev insight, and cast interviews. Yes, Black Panther himself Christopher Judge will be there, and you should, too! Right after this at 10 am PT on twitch.tv/crystaldynamics!

The Roper Report -

00:07:42 - Control Passes 10 Million Players & Remedy is working on 6 games
00:18:58 - Xbox Head Phil Spencer loves the Steam Deck
00:20:07 - “Is this the answer for Xbox?” - Anonymous
00:28:02 - Nintendo Orders ROM Site To ‘Destroy’ All Its Games, Or Else
00:33:20 - Ads
00:37:30 - Evo is back in person in 2022
00:40:00 - Call of Duty Vanguard reveal confirmed for Warzone
00:43:17 - Out today
00:45:50 - Squad Up: Jordan Deeb - Marvel’s Avengers - Invite.gg/kfavengers 
00:46:40 - You‘re Wrong
00:47:47 - Post Show
This Week’s Hosts:
Tuesday - Janet & Gary
Wednesday - Blessing & Andy
Thursday - Tim & Tam
Friday - Greg & Ryan Penagos
